website_summaries.verdict: In a world of short ladders that are cheaply built, this one is comes as a welcome change of pace.
pros: Very tall ladder at 6', built to last, lightweight, safe, and holds up to 300 pounds
cons: So tall it can be hard to store and expensive

customer_reviews.title: Very Stable Excellent Foot Comfort Secure Latch
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional photographer and I often need to get to a higher vantage point for group photos or sporting event video work. This ladder is easy to load, carry and setup. It makes no squeaky noises once setup. The rubber feet are soft enough that they hold their position on smooth flooring without marking. The treads are wide and comfortable for my feet. The platform is wide and deep enough for comfort and the ladder doesn't wobble around, so pretty stable for video. For the light weight, I am impressed by the strength and stability of this ladder and I am very glad I bought it! I highly recommend this ladder as comfortable and SAFE. No reservations at all.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy The Frog

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: While I do like this ladder and did order another after yesterday's fall, this is what the ladder looked like after the tumble. No I can't blame the ladder for the fall. But no way it should have snapped in half on one side. It's why I can't give it any better than 2 stars on it's durability. And, yup, I now have 3 stitches in my upper lip (and a swollen face). Ow!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really lite and safe
customer_reviews.text: OK, I waited until I had used this ladder for two months before writing this review. I am 74 and couldn't lift some or our older ladders. I just moved into an older home and have used it everyday in every room and have no trouble lifting and moving it around. It is very sturdy and I feel safe climbing up and down on it. An excellent buy for what I needed and now some of my friends want one.
customer_reviews.author: Marchada Keener

customer_reviews.title: HELP! Ladder is broken DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: I just took this $100 dollar ladder out of the box and the leg is cracked. Looks like where the screw was put it in, it split the metal. Not safe at all. I am very unhappy. The box was huge and I tore it open. So now, I have a $100 ladder, and it will be a mass nightmare to find a stupid box for it and send it back!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkie09

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our one story Ranch-style.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband to help aid in his completion of my Honey, do list. Must be working because he’s painted the guest bedroom, put up Christmas lights and will be cleaning the gutters this weekend. He says it’s light enough to carry around from job to job but sturdy enough to make you feel confident you won’t be hitting the deck. He’s on the closer end of 290 so I wasn’t sure if I should go for a higher weight capacity but in the end, I think this one will work on another kind on incentive.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: More convenient than a traditional 6' ladder..
customer_reviews.text: This 6' flip-N-go is 4' from the floor to the top platform, feels very sturdy, weighs 15 pds and folds effortlessly. There's a small tray in the very top of the ladder. We have very high ceilings, and this is MUCH easier and less bulkier to get up and down stairs and maneuver around, yet it enables me to do everything that I did with any other ladder I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: BFol

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good - with one exception
customer_reviews.text: How can you love a ladder? - This one is amazing, its stable, light, easy to setup, you feel stable standing on the top platform - the ONLY complaint is that if you stand on any of the lower rungs, your shin/knee is resting against a very sharp edge of the top platform causing considerable pain. The designer should have created a Rounded front edge to the platform to make it comfortable. I actually attached a piece of foam insulation tubing commonly used to insulate copper tuning, and it now is painless.
customer_reviews.author: Ex-Codder

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: I am in my 70th year old female who lives alone and bought this as I moved to downsized housing--still 1,100 sq. ft--and had to unpack everything myself. This was such a safe and easily moveable way to get things onto closet shelves and upper cupboards. And at I believe only about 12 lbs. was not a great burden to move around and folding is a breeze. Used for hanging pictures etc. It does not take up much space for storing. After 2 months of constant use, I can find no criticisms--wish I would have had sooner!
customer_reviews.author: sage

customer_reviews.title: Is this really a 6 foot ladder?
customer_reviews.text: The top handle is six feet tall, but the top step is just 45 inches from the ground. Therefore, I wouldn't call this a six foot ladder. I was going to use it to get into my attic, since contractors have used their 6 foot ladders for that purpose. However, it won't work for that. This is a nicely-made stepstool that's a bit taller than most.
customer_reviews.author: Flannery

customer_reviews.title: best ladder
customer_reviews.text: Got the 4 ft this time. I've had the 6 ft for years. Love the thing. If there were 100 stars, this would rate them. Weighs nothing. Top platform is so safe. Zero wobble. It snaps into place, but just a light lift to the handle closes it back up. The top tool tray is excellent support. Haven't fallen off the balcony yet... VERY sturdy. Makes me wish I were younger so I could get a few more decades' use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought a flip lite ladder last year and was so impressed with it I decided to buy one for my son. The second one was nothing like the first. It’s very light, which is good, but it’s also very wobbly and doesn’t sit flat on the floor. My son didn’t want it and since the box was damaged and I didn’t want the inconvenience of returning it, I now am stuck with it. It was a “buy again” purchase so I don’t know why it is a totally different ladder than the first. I will not buy from this company again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Very practical & safe
customer_reviews.text: This Little Giant aluminum 5 ft. step ladder is so useful around the house. Especially for seniors who are not as steady on ladders or step stools. There are 3 steps & even the highest step gives you some security with a rail to hold onto when you need it. The ladder weighs nothing, its that light. I can fold it more easily than any other step stool I have ever had & can store it in a small space. Wish I had known about these a few years ago when I fell from a step stool with only 2 steps.
customer_reviews.author: Gram 26

customer_reviews.title: An Intermediate-Size Folding Ladder That's Very Practical To Use
customer_reviews.text: We had expected quite a lot from the reviews, but it's even BETTER! Very Stable with legs ladder fully extended; a light weight that's easy for my wife and I to carry and to place. If we go up two or three steps, it's just right for replacing ceiling light bulbs or cleaning light shades. And a nice "four-sided" tray on top to hold the light bulbs and/or any tools one needs for the project. It's beginning to be used a LOT in our home! Regards,
customer_reviews.author: dickb

customer_reviews.title: It's only 2 ft, not 4 ft
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes no sense, it only lifts you 2ft high, but takes up space as a 4 ft ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Obormot

customer_reviews.title: A better ladder
customer_reviews.text: I really like the mechanism to open and close the ladder. No more no worries about getting pinched by a hinge or not fully engaging it. I also like the top step platform and the extra space created by the removal of that rung you are never to step on but for some reason the ladder makers keep it there as if to double dog dare you to risk it. A ladder is a ladder and they all do the job but this ladder is (IMHO) a big improvement on the basic concept.
customer_reviews.author: RTee

customer_reviews.title: Study and so lightweight it's easy to use around the house.
customer_reviews.text: I have tall ceilings and really needed 6 ft. stepladder for use inside the house. At the same time, I much prefer the smaller stepstools because they are lightweight and easy to move about the house, and carry up and down the stairs. With a heavier ladder, you are always bumping it into walls. This thing is incredibly light, I was so amazed. It's sturdy too, with a nice wide platform on top. It folds simply by pulling up the handle on the top step, like a stepstool does. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: rex

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST LADDER FOR SENIORS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ladder because it is the best ladder out there for me .This ladder did not disappoint me because it is perfect ladder to do anything you cannot reach light bulbs ,batteries in smoke detectors ,arrange items in the top of cabinets and closets .If I could not get another one I would not sell my Little Giant for $500.00 .If you buy this ladder you will not regret it .Stop wasting your money on the 2 step cheap ladders !
customer_reviews.author: C L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a lightweight ladder for women to toss around!
customer_reviews.text: This is the lightest and easiest ladder to use. I am going to be 63 yrs old and we moved into a condo with VERY high ceilings..this is a piece of cake to move around and open..we have 10 foot high ceilings and this allows me to step up to that ceiling and change light bulbs and air filters...worth every penny! Also, u should use shoes when utilizing this as the steps are made so that u do not slip on them..which I love..kinda rough for bare feet..I love this ladder!
customer_reviews.author: lyb

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my in-laws
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law fell backwards on a small 2-step step stool when she lost her balance. She's fine except for a bruised ego. Thinking of her safety, we got this 2-step platform ladder which has more support for her while she climbs. We have peace of mind that she will be able to support herself easier and the bonus is she likes it and replaced the non-supporting step stool in her pantry. She uses it almost on a daily basis in order to get items from the top shelves. The ladder is lightweight and easy to carry, setup and fold. We are trying to decide between the 2-step (4-foot) or 3-step (5-foot) for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Dan JTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: best yet!
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired safety engineer who worked for a major airline for 35 years and ladders and high work platforms where all part of my job along with enforcement for safety reasons I also was part of designing safe easy to use all sorts of ladders and work platforms. this ladder has all the features I would design in a 6" ladder at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: gary b. shanks

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I like this ladder because (1) it is so light, (2) it is stable, (3) it is easy to use, (4) I bought size 6 feet and therefore it is a medium height ladder for me that I could reach most of places in my house, and (5) last but not least, it was on sale when I bought it. Thank you for your outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Perfect utility ladder!
customer_reviews.text: I only thought this brand had those complicated, twist’em, turn’em multi folding ladder featured on infomercials. That’s why I’m so pleased with this easy to handle; well thought out, stable ladder; perfect for use in my apartment. The step stand is a plus. I recommend this six foot ladder without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Stable, Sturdy, Easy to Carry
customer_reviews.text: I don't like ladders. This one works for me. It has a wide platform that you can stand on. The arms on the sides are perfect for bracing your legs while standing on the platform. It makes this a very stable ladder for someone with frequent dizziness. It's high enough that I can reach everything that I need to reach. I like this ladder so much, this is the second time I have purchased a Little Giant Flip-n-Light ladder. I'm replacing the first one because it was lost in a fire. If I hadn't liked the first one so much, I would be searching for something different now.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Everybody needs this ladder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ladder to use in our new home to reach the upper cabinets in my kitchen. I wanted it to stay clean and nice and store it in my pantry. My husband immediately confiscated it, uses it outdoors daily, and says he can't believe what a sturdy lightweight ladder this is. I agree with him and It's well worth the price. Since he has "dirtied" up my ladder I'm officially giving it to him and buying another one to claim for myself!
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sturdy but light weight step stool so that my wife could safely reach the upper kitchen cabinets. This small ladder (4 foot model) is perfect for the task. She has no problem lifting it and the open and close is very simple. The top step platform is firm and roomy and she feels very secure and safe. The tall front portion is the right hight for her to hold on and keep her balance. We really don't use the top shelf tool holder but it is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: daninct

customer_reviews.title: This ladder is the best one I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is the best one I've ever seen. It's made of heavy duty aluminum and is incredibly easy to open and close! The ladder is heavy enough to be vibration-free, but still light enough for a small person to maneuver, It is tall enough to allow me to reach the top of the window frames in my house which has 10 foot ceilings. The platform is stable, and the ladder folds flat for easy storage. This ladder is a dream! And the price is very reasonable. I cannot say enough good things about this ladder ... LOVE THIS LADDER!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Rothenhoefer

customer_reviews.title: Step came bent
customer_reviews.text: It is beyond understanding how a step could come so bent....it took much pounding with a rubber mallet to get it back in place and even then still had "hump" . As I am a small woman , it seems study enough to still be safe and did not want the hassle of sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder
customer_reviews.text: We love Lil Giant ladders. This two-step ladder is easy to carry and is strong enough to support my husband, who weighs about 240 pounds. (A lot of two-step ladders only carry up to 200 pounds). The orange plastic piece on the top is set up so you could put something small in it and it wouldn't roll off; a feature that has been handy many times. We've used it to put things away in cabinets; it also works well when he has to load in and load out his band equipment into our pick-up truck (he's a bass player in .
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder!
customer_reviews.text: If your needs don't extend to heavy-duty, heavy-weight, huge commercial applications, this is a superb choice for anyone. It is easily maneuverable, easily foldable, small enough to tuck behind a door. It is now go-to ladder for little things around the house, on the porch, the back deck, in the garage -- wherever, even in the kitchen to find out what I've put in those cabinets and shelves way at the top and in the back (and you know you've got 'em, too). I couldn't be happier with this gem of a ladder.
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong! Great Mighty Product.
customer_reviews.text: I love 💘 💗 ♥ 💓 💛 💖 💘 this little feather weight ladder. I use it daily in my house to clean ceiling fans, shine my cabinetry, put up large pictures, and just keep it available because it us the perfect giant but tiny ladder for everyday use. Literally I have it in my walk-in pantry. My kitchen is large with high cabinets and I can finally start storing my goods up on the higher shelves that I was not utilizing because of the height. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a chance to use this ladder and as a 'senior citizen' with two replaced knees, I can tell you this thing is awesome. Lightweight. Very easy to open and close. Absolutely love the security of being able to lean against the top handle. You can even stand on the very top platform if necessary; although I have not done so, my son has. I feel very safe and secure on this ladder. My son, who can carry and use any ladder he wants, really likes this one also. I may have to put a lock on it.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and very stable
customer_reviews.text: Redoing all painted surfaces in house. This ladder was a great improvement over step stools and wobbly wood ladder. Very stable with sturdy shelf at top. Extended frame makes all the difference as a place to hold on to. Light weight and easy for this senior lady to move.
customer_reviews.author: Plivinwell

customer_reviews.title: Light and sturdy, as promised
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for a light, yet sturdy, ladder. This is it! I also love that because of the platform, I can stand higher on it than other ladders. It’s easy to maneuver (I’m not super strong), and I’m looking forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Reene

customer_reviews.title: A great little ladder for those indoor chores
customer_reviews.text: Boy I cannot say enough good things about this latter, as I was looking to replace my wooden stepladders which are over 45 years old I was very glad to find this one it is very light and easy to carry and maneuver, will hold up to 300 pounds in weight, the latter rungs are wide enough you do not get fatigued standing on them, and I love the tray on top. Although I got the 6 foot model and I am very well pleased with it for all indoor chores the 5 foot model probably would have done just as well. Great little latter
customer_reviews.author: G.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4' step ladder that I have used for many years. It is a little shakey when I try to use the top step to reach light fixtures. I am 70 so I do not need to take a chance of falling off a ladder. I bought the 5' ladder which is basically the same as my existing ladder, except that the top step is a PLATFORM and there is a handrail for more stability. The little tool holder on the handrail is great. I was installing some new lights and it was SOOO convenient for wire nuts, screws tools. The easy folding feature is very nice. Overall I think this a quality well built product.
customer_reviews.author: Jake the Snake

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT !
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC PRODUCT ! I am a big guy, 6'3" and about 280#; standard household step-ladders are too narrow and too flimsy. I am always afraid they will collapse under me. This Little Giant is wide enough for comfort and stability, has a nice, high safety rail and is solidly built. The top rail has a convenient small parts tray. the extra wide top step is very comfortable. As an added bonus, it closes very easily and is small and easy to store. I LOVE IT !!!
customer_reviews.author: bigred

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Stepladder, in all areas = as good as they get, and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: After reading many, many reviews, this ladder rose to the top, partially because of it's 300 lb rating, which is a good indicator of quality. And when I look at the design details/construction, from an engineering standpoint (which I am), this ladder has it all. The real icing on the cake being that it's not only super strong/sturdy, along with zero wobble, but especially light in weight. In summary, it rates even better than 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Zehler

customer_reviews.title: Quality Step Ladder
customer_reviews.text: This is a Little Giant product and it lives up to the same quality, durability and functionality. There are many step ladders to choose from but this is one of the better ones. For safety it was important to have a lot of ladder extend beyond the top step platform. This allows you to safely ascend by having something to hold onto. The ladder is light weight and also it folds down very compact. We have a nine foot ceiling and this allows us to complete any projects, including those that reach the ceiling. I think the price was very reasonable too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this ladder, light weight, nice steps and has support grip at the top. Even better, shortly after it's arrival one of my smoke detectors started beeping! Problem instantly solved! Still smiling!!!
customer_reviews.author: Love to Help

customer_reviews.title: Unbearable CREAKING
customer_reviews.text: ****Updating review after literally throwing this IN THE TRASH. Yep. It was... ‘functional’, but in a couple months it started to CREAK, (actually more of a nails-on-chalkboard/wrenching scream combo) with EVERY STEP or large movement. So much so that I avoided projects involving the ladder. I’m fit and weigh 198 and this thing is rated for 300. ***Get their little giant Green fiberglass combo ladder*** 6’ doubles to 12’!! Very impressed, had no idea where to start looking for a ladder... but this is thing is so solid, light, and locks into place. Has sanded down corners, and even built in carrying handle. Couldn't be happier. Just need to buy a taller one next time!
customer_reviews.author: Bill K

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight ladder
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy ladder. I really like the extension on the top and the platform just below it. The platform holds my paint although I wish I could think of a way to make my roller tray or paint can more secure. The tray at the top is nice too - holds small tools and fasteners at the ready so I don't have to go up and down or put them in my pockets. Very happy with the ladder. It is a lightweight ladder so not commercial grade but perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality Rugged Small Ladder
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty and top of the line quality. No movement at all when standing on it. A bit pricey and have seen them for less elsewhere. But the reason I purchased it is because I'm old and really shouldn't be on ladders. I love the steady rail that extends almost to waist level. Perfect for painting my ceilings. .....don't tell my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and having the ability to step up to the top large width stair with the added bar to provide some balance is a definite plus. The tray for needed tools / hardware is really nice. Imagine not having sharp tools and screws/nails in your pockets as you climb the ladder. Very pleased and again Little Giant is proving its superior ladders are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: PetsHuman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable ladder.
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than I expected, easier to setup & fold than the old Werner (which was heavier & shorter, but holds same weight). The tool slot at the top is most useful and reminds some people NOT to stand on the top of ladders. Middle shelf is plenty wide for tools, etc. I usually have to make a shelf out of wood and they don't stay on or with the ladder very well. Made in the USA with high quality control. That's a great plus for safety and engineering.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Nice ladder, but a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this ladder and purchasing a Gorilla brand 3-step ladder (also on Amazon). I still have the larger version of this ladder and love it, but this one is heavier and as large as the 3-step ladder I ultimately purchased. Nothing wrong with this ladder, but I preferred the other.
customer_reviews.author: DBJ III

customer_reviews.title: Reaching with Ease
customer_reviews.text: The Flip-N-Lite is exactly what I needed. As I grew older and less sure of myself on stools, I was also shrinking vertically and expanding circumferentially making it difficult to reach things I once reached with ease. Age also saps strength and I couldn't lift many of the taller ladders capable of holding my increasing poundage. This ladder is light and easy to move to where I need it. It is stable! It allows me to reach that light bulb in the ceiling light fixture or hang a picture on the wall without having to call a handyman or rely on the compassion of tall neighbors and strangers.
customer_reviews.author: JGH

customer_reviews.title: Stable, balanced,  wry safe ladder at a good price. Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. At only 12 lbs, this ladder has replaced an old wooden one i’ve Had for years. I’m 74 yo and this is so easy to open, close and move around. Very balanced and stable and I love the security of the top holding rail. The price was is excellent, especially with my added discount from the amazon store 5% on other purchases. And didn’t have to figure out how to get it here had I bought locally. So all in all, I highly recommend this ladder
customer_reviews.author: S BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Safe, lightweight, and very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ladder to use as a mounting block because the top platform is approximately 33.5 inches high and is perfect for me to get on my mare. A 3 step mounting block top step is only 22 inches high and is too short. A 4 step mounting block is only made in England, not exported, and goes for more than $450. Well my husband needed to do electrical work at the church, kidnapped my ladder, and now the preacher wants one of these ladders. Go figure. It is the most stable, safe ladder I have ever used. I am planning for the 6 foot Flip-N-Light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small home
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ladder to use in my 1600 sq. foot home. No need for a taller ladder as my ceilings are only 9 feet high. I weigh 245 pounds and the ladder adequately supports me . I did research on other ladders and concluded that this particular one fit my needs the best. Not at all disappointed in my decision. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa S

customer_reviews.title: Ladder works great and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This 6 ft. Little Giant Ladder works great and feels sturdy. Came in original box, but was in good shape. Lightweight and makes changing smoke detector batteries easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne's Music

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases ever!
customer_reviews.text: We live in an over 55 condo with high ceilings and multiple smoke detectors and this stepladder has been wonderful. I'm short but can reach the ceiling with this and feel very secure because it has the raised part above the highest step. It's light enough for me to carry easily and folds flat. I am so happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma C

customer_reviews.title: I'm In Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ladder with a passion. I'm a 79 year old female, and I feel so safe climbing up the ladder and then having this wonderful step to stand on at the top. It's sturdy and very secure, and it has a bonus. When you want to close up the ladder, there is a handle on the top step. You just grab the handle, pull and the ladder closes up. Also, it's light enough for me to carry, and I'm small. You will not regret buying it. I've even bought two, one for me and one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one I have bought in two years.
customer_reviews.text: Not because the first one wore out, but because my husband stole it to use at our gas house to make it easier to fill the tractor. I bought the six foot version for the house, and I couldn't be happier. I can reach everything with ease now, and it is going to make repainting my kitchen a breeze. This is a heavy duty, very sturdy ladder that folds away neatly for storage. I wouldn't trust another brand of ladder to hold my weight the way that this one does. I won't have to replace this bad boy in my lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: SquarePeg

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight - Easy for older woman to use
customer_reviews.text: I like this ladder because it is so much lighter than other ladders of the same height. I am an older woman and I can easily move this ladder around my house to change light bulbs, etc. Most ladders are far too heavy for me to lift and move, but this one is great. Heavier men might not feel that it is sturdy, but it is very sturdy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Another Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control?
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and felt unsteady, albeit more steady than a big box, lower-priced, fiberglass alternative. I felt my ladder was uneven on level ground so I sought a return. Amazo--or the manufacturer--sent me a new one with the directions to send the initial purchase back. Unfortunately, 2nd ladder was WORSE THAN THE FIRST! One leg did not touch the level ground.
customer_reviews.author: N. Koz

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for in a ladder
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted - very light and easy to carry. To collapse the ladder, you simply pull the orange handle on the top step - couldn't be easier or more intuitive. Very stable - I stood on the very top rung which got me to the exact height I needed to clean tops of new cabinets and the blades of a ceiling fan - the orange bar at the top is a nice safety feature. Price of the ladder was about 1/3 the cost of ONE visit by a housekeeping company to clean high areas in my house (12' ceilings). Couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AuntMeg

customer_reviews.title: Nice later to stand on.
customer_reviews.text: Great later to stand on for long periods of time. Very light to carry around as well. The Tool tray is great for screws, nuts, bolts, etc... I found it a little iffy for power tools. I never lost a tool while up there but you had to be careful. I would recommend this later for working indoors and out. Especially for someone who does not want to carry a heavy ladder around. I am a pretty big guy and I felt very comfortable on this ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Morwhsky

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Lightweight. Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I Should have ordered this year's ago. My old step ladder always felt kind of rickety and scary, but I thought "it's good enough" This new ladder is perfect ! Light weight. Easy to handle and feels super sturdy. Just the right size for household projects like changing interior AC air filters. Ladder is Better than I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: LB12

customer_reviews.title: Love This Great Ladder
customer_reviews.text: Just received this gem of a ladder and am already using it to adjust the air conditioner vents throughout my home. I'm 5.5 feet tall and can reach the vents on the 9 foot ceiling without even standing on the platform. It's lightweight so I can easily carry it from room to room, but also feels perfectly steady even on carpet. Love the grab bar that extends past the top for a feeling of extra security. I also have an eight foot ladder for a few really high places, but this was a great purchase and not so tall that I can't store it in the utility room.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love this ladder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ladder. I use it in my business. I have one of the huge, heavy little giant ladders that is so heavy. I always hated having to drag it out of my trailer to prune taller shrubs. Yes, it will go higher than this lighter one. But for the most part I can reach everything I need to with this new one. Not sure you are supposed to stand on the top landing but I have all the time holding a heavy extended trimmer. I weigh 175 and the ladder has held up. And it is flippin lite!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Flip-N-Lite Stepladder, 4-Foot
customer_reviews.text: It's a good ladder for my uses. I use it in the house to change ceiling light bulbs, smoke alarm batteries, clean over interior window frames. It is light enough for me to maneuver (senior, disabled). It is extremely affordable. It is easy to store. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gabrielson

customer_reviews.title: Great Stepladder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ladder. I have bad knees and questionable ankles so I’m a little nervous on ladders and step stools. I love this one because I can hold on and feel secure & that’s a huge deal if you have balance issues or joint problems. It doesn’t move as you’re using it either. Someday hopefully soon, I want to purchase the big ladder.
customer_reviews.author: dbee

customer_reviews.title: Light weight ladies ladder
customer_reviews.text: I built a new house and decided that I needed a new ladder. I bought this ladder as one that had been returned to amazon. Granted, it did have some scratches and signs of use, but it has been a good ladder for me. It is very light weight - something a lady needs. And, while building the house, I think all the builders used it at one time or another. They seemed to like it better than their own. It has a good sized folding tray to sit things on and the very top orange plastic piece has a tray too. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SoGal

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy strong and light.
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is very light. When you put it in place and climb up it feels solid. You feel comfortable and in control. I bought a ladder hanger to go with it. Now it hangs handy in the garage just waiting to go back to work. I also like the top and the big step.
customer_reviews.author: David Gerald Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and tall!
customer_reviews.text: I’m only 5’2” and female. I can move ladder easily and I very seldom need to use the top platform. The stairs are much higher than an average ladder so I reach great heights when painting 8 and 9 foot walls. 10 feet would be a breeze but I do not deal with that height. Good ladder for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Denise LeBeau

customer_reviews.title: A "Must Have" for home or office
customer_reviews.text: I have the Little Giant 17' ladder which is great, but it weight a considerable amount. I found this little jewel and it is amazing how light weight but sturdy. It takes up very little space and folds and unfolds very easily. Has a nice little tray on top for those screws and nails you may need to keep up with. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Billy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great unit - my favorite ladder
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Light but very stable. The “handle” is a little odd though - collapses the ladder easily, but is larger than it needs to be considering it’s useless for actually carrying the ladder. Still, it’s my favorite ladder, and I have a bunch.
customer_reviews.author: RustyCas

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight AND sturdy! Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have finally found a ladder that I can use around the house for many jobs that is so easy to fold, that is so lightweight that i can carry with one hand and yet is solid enough to handle my weight and tools. I have other Little Giant ladders including a 6' one. Great ladders but the weight held me back. Wore me out just moving around. This is perfect! Jobs finished so much faster! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie P. Moses

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, strong, and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We went with this style rather than a conventional ladder. It was for our new home with 14 ft. Walls, and tall cabinets. Very impressed with its strong easy folding style. I'm 220 lbs. And I felt safe and secure on the top step! The design with the higher frame to lean into makes this ladder a must for the home or shop.
customer_reviews.author: Out West

customer_reviews.title: Love this ladder.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a ladder that was easy for me (68 year old woman) to move and use. This ladder serves the job perfectly. I can bring it in the house to change out an air filter or light bulb without having to struggle with the old heavy ladder. It really is light weight and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but sturdy.  Easy to fold and unfold.  Good handhold while climbing to the second step.
customer_reviews.text: Boy, do I like this ladder. Wow! I am no longer young, and don't belong on a ladder. However, this one allows me to go up at least two steps and hold on. That's enough for most of my purposes. For anything higher, I hire someone. This ladder is very lightweight, but sturdy. Easy to store. Easy to carry. Very easy to set up and fold down. I have another more traditional 6 foot ladder, but I never use it. I use this one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Niell Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 9' ceiling 3 story house!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is exactly what I hoped it would be. We have vaulted ceilings in a couple of areas of our upstairs. Specifically a closet light and return vent filter. I had an old 6' wooden ladder that worked but wasn't as sturdy as I'd like. This ladder will work in the hundreds of ways we use ladders in our house better than the old one for sure. I especially love having the platform. I weighed this ladder and it is exactly 14 lbs. It folds very easily. My only criticism: It doesn't have anything that keeps it folded. It's not a big issue, just need to be mindful when carrying it on stairs.
customer_reviews.author: C. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight, and narrow when collapsed ladder is perfect for my home with cabinets that go to the ceiling of my 10 foot high kitchen. It’s made that storage space much more useful. The ladder feels very sturdy (I stood on the top platform). It truly is super easy to open and close. Be sure to plan for where you will store it. The ladder is very narrow and I had planned to put it in the space between my refrigerator and the wall because there is a 4.5 inch gap but I has not considered its height. The ladder is too tall to fit under the cabinet that is over my refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: C Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder for a Small Apartment
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal compromise for me (5'7" and 150 pounds) the second step is the ideal height for normal height cabinets and ceilings but the platform (safe to stand on) gives you the height to avoid serious issues of unsafely over extending the reach from a smaller step school, like the very back of the top of kitchen cabinets or the highest, least accessible shelf in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Rob the Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Don't short yourself.  BUy the 6 foot model.
customer_reviews.text: I am 6 feet and I have to climb to the upper step to reach a fire alarm in a vaulted ceiling. The ladder looks like it will last a long time. You never know when you need that extra steps. Even if you do not need work on the highest step you will be more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Everglades

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight ladder!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered a multi-position ladder and although this was great for more complex jobs especially outside the house, it is very heavy and so for the odd few times I needed to use the basic stepladder function, I found it hard to carry up and down stairs. This ladder is perfect. It is very lightweight and also has a good height for most internal house jobs. I have vaulted ceilings and needed to change the battery on a smoke detector and this ladder was tall enough to reach without climbing all the way to the top. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J

customer_reviews.title: Great little 5-foot ladder
customer_reviews.text: My 3-foot wooden ladder is getting quite old and wanted something small for inside the house. This ladder perfectly fit the bill. It is light and very sturdy, easy to move around and big enough to reach anywhere in the house. Highly recommended. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: You need this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have high ceilings and lots of other reasons to have a super light weight ladder so I can clean and fix things easily (like that light above my garage door). If you live in a house, and need a ladder, this is what you need. It is stable and I can carry it up and down stairs by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Constance P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reaching high ceilings and attic access panels
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent ladder -- lightweight and easy to maneuver up and down stairs. It opens and closes easily and folds up into a small footprint. We use it to reach smoke alarms, lights, etc. up to 10 feet high. The wide top platform also makes it much easier to access our attic, rather than a regular stepladder.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisL

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Christmas Light Hanging Help
customer_reviews.text: Just the right height for hanging Christmas lights on a tree, on gutters, and around the house. Very light and sturdy, and folds pretty flat. Not quite as tall as a standard 6-foot ladder, but the stability when standing on the top platform makes up for it. The tray at the top is also a nice feature. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ferris Bueller

customer_reviews.title: Light and yet feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed to get the job done! I have an old back/neck injury so the fact that this is super light makes a huge difference to me. I still felt safe and secure on the top step, and like the lightweight did not detract from the sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: TiaM

customer_reviews.title: Oh Yeah!!! Perfection!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pushing 70, been using a wobbly old wood ladder inside forever, bought this and it's amazing! It's light, easy to move around, and sturdy ... meaning SAFE ... the design provides stability on the standing platform.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Ladder
customer_reviews.text: Love this little ladder. It's well made, light weight and sturdy. I definitely recommend this ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G Kelsay

customer_reviews.title: great for general use
customer_reviews.text: A bit bigger than a usual house step ladder primarily because it has the extension about the step for additional support [great idea]. Good nonslip feet. Last step is a platform that is sturdy and feels comfortable. Good quality, surprisingly light so maneuverability good [ product not heavy]. This is my third ladder from Little Giant and I was very happy with the previous 2.
customer_reviews.author: goezy007

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Best purchase ever on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, this is the best purchase I have ever made on Amazon in my 15 years of being a Prime Member! This has made my home ownership so much easier. I can literally do things myself that I never thought possible! The top platform is stable and makes me feel secure in hard to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: Nutragirl

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have ladder!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Opens a whole new world of home improvement for me! Always leary of ladders, but this one is so well made I have no problem standing on the platform. I have very high ceilings with can lighting that I have had to pay someone to change out lightbulbs for me. No more, I have changed light bulbs, installed ceiling hooks for hanging plants, plant hooks on my 2nd floor deck, cleaned my ceiling air vents, etc. It is a great, well made product and does not take uo much room when storing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: lightweight yet great quality
customer_reviews.text: 5': Great slim profile lightweight ladder. The tray at top is narrow but a handy person prob could modify. There is a lot of grip on each metal step and with bare feet you feel it but its not unbareable. High quality I believe a contractor could use everyday. I have it for interior jobs and stores easily in interior closet.
customer_reviews.author: AMJD

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and very stable
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly stable and lightweight ladder for the simpler jobs around the house. Provides an excellent platform for the vertically challenged family members to reach the higher cabinets and shelves. Folds to less than four inches thick and is easily hung in an out of the way place until needed. Appears to be made with excellent quality. I'd love to say that I'd buy this again, but I don't think I'll have to. I expect this ladder will last for a good long while.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Flip-n-Lite 6 Ft. Ladder. Holds upto 300 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: This is the ladder for everyone. I am a 68 yr. old woman, and I have no problem moving this ladder around. We just went thru a Hurricane and all the neighbors now ordered this ladder also. It is soooooo light weight, but super sturdy. My son weighs 250 lbs. and was completely secure. Many people have borrowed this ladder due to the hurricane and it just moves around like a Champ !!!!! Could not be happier !!
customer_reviews.author: CLH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and carry.
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is very light and sturdy. I have fell off a ladder and broken my ankle before so I'm still nervous about climbing one. I read the reviews before I purchased this ladder and figured I would try it. I cautiously step on and felt supported. The only thing and it's not a big deal is how far the ladder sits from the wall when it's open. Other than that I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford E. Watson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LADDER
customer_reviews.text: I already owned a 5' Flip-N-Lite and never experienced anything like it. I love these ladders!! They're so easy to open and close with one hand. They're light weight and real study. So much better working on a platform rather than a rung or a step. I use the tray on top all the time to hold screws and screwdrivers and the such. Every woman should have one of these. Smart men could use one too. Had to buy the 6' to add to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ladder OK but arrived dirty and scratched - don't know if it is new.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this ladder today. It seems to be working fine, but I have a major complaint about the condition I got it in. It does not look brand-new. There are quite a few scratches on it, and it was covered with a thin gray metallic dust/grease. I sprayed it down with some metal cleaner, and gave it a quick rinse down with some hot water in the shower, so we'll see how it goes. I'm expecting this to be a good letter, but it sure doesn't seem new to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Ladder
customer_reviews.text: Love this little ladder. Feels very sturdy, is lightweight, and is very easy to fold/unfold.
customer_reviews.author: TuttleShopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Sticker on Ladder Warns Against Using Top Step
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed because the description says that the highest step/platform is 45" when in fact the highest safe step to use is about 36". The sticker on the ladder clearly states that the 45" high step is not to be used to stand on. I could have bought a shorter ladder if I just wanted to stand merely 36" from the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & Easy
customer_reviews.text: Durable, easy to use and carry (not too heavy). This is a great ladder larger than a step ladder but not so big as a regular ladder. This is perfect for a house with high ceilings for cleaning, changing light bulbs and replacing the HVAC filers. This is a terrific ladder!
customer_reviews.author: BaileyK

customer_reviews.title: AWARD WINNER! (should be)
customer_reviews.text: This should win a design award! I bought it to get aboard my boat while on a trailer because it locks open. To open, place your hand on the platform and it quickly opens and locks in place. To close, grab that orange handle and lift.. it closes right up with little effort. You can climb right up onto the platform (6’ model) and feel perfectly safe and secure. The best ladder I’ve ever owned by a mile.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of the "Little Giant" brand name and super easy to move and use
customer_reviews.text: It is "flip-n-lite"---an apt name for it. It's sturdy and the upper bar/tool holder gives you something sturdy to hang onto. My wife who is afraid to use ladders immediately put it to use. When folded upright for storing it wants to partially unfold when leaning against a wall. Ours came with a dent in the main leg but not enough to affect the integrity of its strength. I'd advise using a cleaner on it b/c like lots of aluminum there is a greasy feel to it at first.
customer_reviews.author: Historken

customer_reviews.title: Awesome step ladder !
customer_reviews.text: This is just as described. It's really a flat folding, sturdy smaller ladder. Perfect for a tall shelf, feels safer than a two step stool. Light weight, easy to move around and grips the floor well. Any one can handle it. It has a nice tray for holding tools, and platform snaps open in place so it's solidly sturdy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D.Hart, RCIS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ladder
customer_reviews.text: We put our outdoor Christmas lights up with our beast of a ladder which year after year makes it so much more of a chore. Purchased this for Christmas and took the lights down with it effortlessly. We also have 10’ ceilings and this is perfect to reach without banging up walls. It’s a good ladder so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great little ladder!
customer_reviews.text: At 73, I'm trying to be careful when using ladders. This one feels quite stable and secure, even for me. Used it to climb up and cut some limbs today. Didn't wobble or rock the entire time. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Long

product_meta.title: Little Giant Ladders, Flip-N-Lite, 6-Foot, Stepladder, Aluminum, Type 1A, 300 lbs rated (15270-001)
product_meta.description:
Size Name:6 Ft.

CLIMB IN COMFORT
Unlike most platform stepladders, which are often engineered to be inexpensive, the Little Giant Flip-N-Lite is engineered to be safe without being expensive. The lightweight Flip-N-Lite opens easily with just one hand and offers comfortable, deep rungs with a huge, secure standing platform. With a lightweight, slim profile and extra heavy duty construction (ANSI Type IA 300 lb. rating), the Flip-N-Lite is the perfect climb-in-comfort solution for anyone from a seasoned construction pro to a busy do-it-yourselfer.

View larger FULL FOOT SUPPORT
At 14. 25 in. x 12 in., the Flip-N-Lite's standing platform offers heel-to-toe foot support, eliminating foot pain and fatigue and allowing the user a completely stable, comfortable place to stand while working.

View larger SUPER LIGHTWEIGHT
No matter which model you pick, the Flip-N-Light is slim and light enough for almost anyone to maneuver: 6-Foot Model = 14 lbs. 5-Foot model = 12 lbs. 4-Foot model = 9. 5 lbs.

View larger EXTRA HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION
While the Flip-N-Lite is engineered to be lightweight and easy to handle, it's heavy duty construction is rated to hold up to 300 lbs. on each step and meets or exceeds all applicable Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) and American National Standards Institute (ANSI) standards for product quality and safety.

View larger SECURITY AND CONVENIENCE
Feel confident on your Flip-N-Lite with the tall handrail that adds even more stability and support. It also features a handy tool tray.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER

The lightweight Flip-N-Lite opens easily with just one hand and offers comfortable, deep rungs with a huge, secure standing platform. With a lightweight, slim profile and extra heavy duty construction (ANSI Type IA 300 lb rating), the Flip-N-Lite is the perfect climb-in-comfort solution for anyone from a seasoned construction pro to a busy do-it-yourselfer.
